content.prompt: The running horned woman from Tassili nâ€™Ajjer, Algeria, is presented using which of the following visual characteristics?

choices.label: The figure is placed on a clear ground line.
The figure is represented in composite pose.
The facial features are unique and individualized.

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
